48-year-old female.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis

chronic sinusitis.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management

nasal polyposis.context: This is a 48-year-old female with a history of chronic sinusitis as well as nasal polyposis that have been refractory to outpatient medical management

sinus surgery.context: She has underwent sinus surgery in the past approximately 12 years ago

chronic mucosal thickening.context: CT evaluation revealed evidence of chronic mucosal thickening within the maxillary and ethmoid sinuses

polyposis.context: presence of polyposis within the nasal cavities bilaterally

polypoid disease.context: The initial examination revealed a gross polypoid disease emanating from the sphenoid sinuses as well as off the supreme turbinate

grossly hypertrophied turbinate.context: Inspection revealed a grossly hypertrophied turbinate

bleeding.context: Once all polypoid tissue have been removed, some bleeding that was encountered was controlled with the use of suction cautery in a very conservative manner
